features.Lucky: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack, ability check or saving throw you can reroll but must use this new value.
features.Brave: Advantage on saving throw vs fear.
features.Nimbleness: Can move through the space of any creature that is larger size than you.

features.Naturally Stealthy: Can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only a creature that is at least on size larger than you.

features.Stout Resilience: Advantage on saving throws vs poison and resistant to poison damage.
